tourBios.curYearHigh: Finished T9 at the Chile Classic. Rounds of 68-68 over the first two days at Prince of Wales CC put him in contention heading into the weekend. Shot 70-71 over his final 36 holes to finish five back of Adam Hadwin...Recorded a hole-in-one on the 12th hole during the second round of the Stonebrae Classic in early August.
tourBios.carHigh:
2013: Made the cut in 15 of 22 Web.com Tour starts during his rookie season. Had five top-25 and three top-10 finishes...Earned his first career top-10 with a T3 effort at the BMW Charity Pro-Am. Jumped into a share of the lead when he opened with a 9-under 62 in Greenville. Was only one shot off the pace and paired in the Sunday's final group and was still within striking distance at the turn. Played the final nine at 2-over par and wound up six shots back of winner Mark Anderson...Fired a 65 in the third round of the Air Capital Classic. Finished the tournament T4, good for his second top-five of the year...Finished T10 at the News Sentinel Open...Missed the cut in all four Finals' events...Received a sponsor exemption into the Crowne Plaza Invitational at Colonial in late May for his first career PGA TOUR start. Made the most of things with a T14 finish in front of family and friends. Fired an 8-under 62 in the final round, the best of the day by three strokes, and jumped from a tie for 62nd at the start of the day into the top 15. Collected a paycheck for $112,000. 

2012: Advanced to the final stage of the PGA TOUR Qualifying Tournament for the first time and earned conditional status on the Web.com Tour after finishing T125...Played four events on the Adams Golf Pro Tour Series with his best finish a solo seventh at the Beaumont Open in September...Made six starts on the NGA Hooters Tour. 

2010: Made one start on the Web.com Tour, missing the cut at the Soboba Golf Classic after rounds of 71-71. 

2008: Made his Web.com Tour debut at the WNB Golf Classic, finishing T62 after rounds of 73-71-74-75.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Was the Texas Assocation of Private and Parochial Schools' 5-A individual state champion in 2003 at Paschal High School in Fort Worth...Was the TCU team MVP in 2007-08. Won the 2007 Memphis Intercollegiate while playing for the Horned Frogs. Earned first-team all-Mountain West Conference honors in 2007-08.
tourBios.personal: Favorite golf memory is playing with his dad at Pebble Beach...Favorite food is from Whataburger...Twitter account is @FTankCorpening...Not many people know that he wants to be on "American Idol."...Never travels without his iPod.

tourBios.curYearHigh: Finished T9 at the Chile Classic. Rounds of 68-68 over the first two days at Prince of Wales CC put him in contention heading into the weekend. Shot 70-71 over his final 36 holes to finish five back of Adam Hadwin...Recorded a hole-in-one on the 12th hole during the second round of the Stonebrae Classic in early August.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T3rd in 2013 at the BMW Charity Pro-Am Presented by SYNNEX Corporation.
